sentence.Network_en: Short run , small theatre, the Nessun Dorma set were straight in.
sentence.Network_cn: 演出时间短, 剧场小,《今夜无人入眠》的戏码立即上演.

sentence.Network_en: Lo do a te finche vivro e a nessun altro lo daro.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要我活着,我就把它给你,我只爱着你.

sentence.Network_en: Lo do a te finch ｅ vivr ｏ e a nessun altro lo dar ｏ.
sentence.Network_cn: 我唱催眠曲,这个爱我该给谁.

list.abs: 公主彻夜未眠（Nessun dorma）——王子表达对于公主猜不出自己姓名的信心，并穿插著北京城百姓对于公主的命令之心声。1998年 …

auth_sentence.content: I can't really say what I thought of Darius Campbell singing Nessun dorma; you wouldn't be able to print it.
